text: Ngakho-ke emuva kosizi wathumela ukuphepha phezu kwenu, ingxenye yenu yathathwa ubuthongo kepha enye ingxenye yayicabangela imiphefumulo yayo bacabanga ngoMvelinqangi okungesilona iqiniso, imicabango yokungazi bathi “ngakube siphathelene yini naloludaba na? Ithi ngempela udaba lonke lungolukaMvelinqangi, Bayakufihla emiphefumulweni yabo lokho abangeke bakuveze kuwena bathi “uma besingenza okuthize kuloludaba ngabe asizange sibulawe lapha ithi “ noma ngabe benisezindlini zenu labo ababe ngunyelwe lelo bizo (lokufa) belizobafikela endaweni yabo yokufa, ukuze uMvelinqangi avivinye lokho okusezifubeni zenu futhi ahlanze lokho okusezinhliziyweni zenu futhi uMvelinqangi uyisazi salokho okusezifubeni (okusezinhliziyweni zenu)
